name: Archeological Photography
description: Professional photographs of dinosaur fossils, museum exhibits, and paleontological dig sites. Captures the majesty of prehistoric remains and the exciting process of discovery.

name: Prehistoric Sounds
description: Recreated sounds of the Mesozoic era. Includes interpretations of dinosaur calls, environmental ambience, and the atmospheric sounds of ancient Earth.

name: Zoological Animations
description: Animated sequences bringing prehistoric life to motion. Shows reconstructed dinosaur behaviors, ancient ecosystems, and interpretations of how these magnificent creatures might have lived.

name: Combined Demo
description: For creators who blend music, visuals, and effects into jaw-dropping experiences. Make the crowd gasp, cheer, and ask, "How'd they pull that off?"

name: Prerendered Music
description: Whether it's eurodance, DnB, remastered chiptunes, or a band jam, bring the beats!

name: Tracked Music
description: Old-school vibes meet modern grooves. Tracker enthusiasts, this is your stage.

name: Freestyle Graphics
description: From pixel art to raytracing, or hand-drawn masterpieces, unleash your imagination.

name: Oldschool Graphics
description: Minimal canvas, maximum impact. Show off your skills under strict retro rules.

name: Freestyle Photo
description: Calling all photographers! Show us your most captivating shots.

name: Stop Motion
description: If you love animating the inanimate, this is your moment.

name: Wild
description: Got something that defies categorization? Wild is your playground. From music videos to mind-bending demos, anything goes.

name: GenAI Photo
description: AI-generated images mimicking real-life photography. Your entry should leverage AI tools to generate photorealistic images.

name: GenAI Graphics
description: AI-generated visual art, where artificial intelligence takes the lead in the creation process.

name: GenAI Music
description: Music created primarily with artificial intelligence. Your track should showcase the capabilities of AI in generating or enhancing musical compositions.
